questions.quote: So, then, you know, the light was clearly green, I started walking, he skidded and he went right into my hip.
I-I guess it can't hurt him... People eat *pounds* of those things.
Ma, I know this may be hard for you to understand but I am sure there are many people who do not like me.
What're you talking about? You had a cheque bounce at the bodega.
Oh, I need some water. Ice it up nice and hard ... and when you throw it - Pop! Oh look,  there's my friend, FDR. I'm gonna nail him in the back of the head. It's gonna be great!
Alright, alright, I'll call Heather, you'll get your hat back, I will get a second date. Ha ha ha. Now watch the magic.
Alright. I'll get that money for you in five minutes. And, don't eat any more.
Yeah, Yeah. Well, now that we understand each other -- I'll be taking my business elsewhere. And I want my mother's fur coat back too.
Oh, that's terrible. They stole a rye? Why would they steal a rye?
...They'll saw through bone.Â  Uuuuuuuing yutyutyutyutn naannnaaa [makes saw noises while gesturing over Roy's chest] You'll see what's *inside* bone...
